text: John Henry George Forgham (14 May 1941 - 10 March 2017) was an English actor. He was best known for playing businessman Frank Laslett in the ITV series Footballers' Wives. He was also known for his movie role as Frank in The Italian Job. Forgeham died from internal bleeding and suffered from a broken collarbone after falling at his home in Worthing, East Sussex on 10 March 2017, aged 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Worcestershire
title: John Forgeham
